Estimated production, net imports, and apparent consumption of timber products in the US, 1900-1962

Dataset containing estimated statistics for timber products. All vectors are numeric. Most data is for products in the Industrial Roundwood Class. Each column except the first two and the last one are in this category.

hair1963

Format

A data frame with 85 observations on 38 variables:

Dom.Prod.Tot
Total Domestic Production
ApparentConsumption
Apparent Consumption
Dom.Prod
Domestic Production, Total Ind RW
Imports
Net Imports, Total Ind RW
Prod.SW
Softwood Production, Total Ind RW
Prod.HW
Hardwood Production , Total Ind RW
LogChipImports.SW
Softwood Log and Chip Imports, Total Ind RW
LogChipExports.SW
Softwood Log and Chip Exports, Total Ind RW
LogChipImports.HW
Hardwood Log and Chip Imports, Total Ind RW
LogChipExports.HW
Hardwood Log and Chip Exports, Total Ind RW
SW.PctOfProd
Softwoods as Percent of Production, Total Ind RW
Exports.SW.PctOfProd
Softwood Exports as Percent of Production, Total Ind RW
Exports.HW.PctOfProd
Hardwood Exports as Percent of Production, Total Ind RW
Imports.SW.PctOfConsump
Softwood Imports as Percent of Production, Total Ind RW
Imports.HW.PctOfConsump
Hardwood Imports as Percent of Production, Total Ind RW
SW.Lumber.PctOfTotLumbProd
Softwood Lumber as Percent of Total Lumber Production, Total Ind RW
DV.Exports.Log.PctOfProd
Dollar Value of Log Exports as Percent of Production, Total Ind RW
DV.Imports.Log.PctOfProd
Dollar Value of Log Imports as Percent of Consumption, Total Ind RW
Estimated.Imports
Estimated Imports, Total Ind RW
Estimated.Exports
Estimated Exports, Total Ind RW
Adj.Imports
Adjusted Imports, Total Ind RW
Adj.Exports
Adjust Exports, Total Ind RW
Estimated.Imports(tons)
Estimated Imports in tons, Total Ind RW
Estimated.Exports(tons)
Estimated Exports in tons, Total Ind RW
Adj.Imports(tons)
Adjusted Imports in tons, Total Ind RW
Adj.Exports(tons)
Adjust Exports in tons, Total Ind RW
ApparentConsumption.Total
Apparent Conusmption, Total Ind RW.
SawLogs.Dom.Prod
Domestic Production of Saw Logs
SawLogs.NetImports
Net Imports of Saw Logs. Net imports of lumber converted to cubic feet roundwood. Small quantities of imported saw logs (roundwood form) are included under domestic production.
SawLogs.ApparentConsumption
Apparent Consumption of Saw Logs Includes changes in stocks beginning in 1935.
VeneerLogs.Dom.Prod
Domestic Production of Veneer Logs
VeneerLogs.NetImports
Net Imports of Veneer Logs Net imports of veneer logs represent the equivalent net imports of veneer and plywood converted to board feet log scale, and then to cubic feet round-wood. The small volume of veneer logs imported (roundwood form) is included under domestic production.
VeneerLogs.ApparentConsumption
Apparent Consumption of Veneer Logs.
PulpWood.Dom.Prod
Domestic Production of Pulpwood
PulpWood.NetImports
Net Imports of Pulpwood
PulpWood.ApparentConsumption
Apparent Consumption of Pulpwood
Other.ApparentConsumption
Apparent Consumption of Other Products
FuelWood.ApparentConsumption
Apparent Consumption of Fuelwood

Source

US Department of Commerce and Agriculture and USFS Estimations

Details

Columns may not add to total because of rounding.
